#This package analyzes and manipulates field survey data like traps, tag numbers, locations, etc.

```{R}
devtools::install_github("jasminenasser/fieldsurvey.pkg")
install.packages("vegan")
install.packages("tidyverse")
install.packages("ggplot2")
```

In this tutorial, I will use previous field data from 2005-2013 from North Dakota.0

```{R}
install.packages("googlesheets4")
googlesheets4::gs4_auth()
field <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1hH39exibZwdQyr3IsLzxBMXpfCz0qVN-4mAe673PPpQ/edit?usp=sharing")

```
